title: Please ban this guy - Trolling in Ranked champ select.
body:
brunoso being a dbag.




Ichigooch joined the room.
LeaFCanYe joined the room.
brunoso joined the room.
majorsick joined the room.
iTzTrust joined the room.
brunoso: mid only
iTzTrust: pr jg
brunoso: or afk
Ichigooch: i'm going mid
brunoso: sorry
brunoso: ok feeding
Ichigooch: we will carry you
Ichigooch: dude
Ichigooch: serious
Ichigooch: just afk
Ichigooch: we will win 4v5
iTzTrust: no guys please
iTzTrust: i need to win this
brunoso: i will feed
brunoso: not afk
majorsick: good we can report you and you get a 3 day holiday
Ichigooch: it's ranked, why troll?
brunoso: is feeding
brunoso: coz i need mid
majorsick: you dont need ****
brunoso: thats why
majorsick: you need to **** off
majorsick: thats what you need bro
majorsick: man up you last pick little ******
iTzTrust: someone in provisionals dash please
Ichigooch: take mid, i'll top
Ichigooch: easy
Ichigooch: or you can afk
Ichigooch: idc

replies.body:
1. Everyone was exhibiting negative behaviour in that log.
2. This is not the place to post them. It's against the universal rules to report other players on the boards. Instead, create a support ticket and follow what they say to do.
